name: Legitimate Tower Defense
description:
Our first “complete” game, Legitimate Tower Defense, a monument to everything but legitimate code, stands as a sellout game with outrageous amounts of advertising, lag, and fun!

Best experienced with Adobe Flash Player, but will fall back to Ruffle player if Flash is unavailable.

Originally released April 16th, 2009.
